MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Hendy Road, Clayton Road and surrounding streets.  This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  1:24PM. Our emergency response team are onsite carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:25PM on 10th January 2021
